text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Because you're trying to tie small business relief and the #PPP to more tax breaks for corporations and the 1%. If you'd stop doing that, I'm sure the Dems would approve it. Unfortunately you're using covid-19 as a way to enrich yourself and all your friends, and we get scraps.
